LanguageData.EdB.ColonistBar.Prefs.SmallIcons.Tip: Select this option to display small icons in the colonist status bar.\n\nThis option works best for smaller screen resolutions or colonies with lots of colonists.
LanguageData.EdB.EmptyStockpile.Prefs.EmptyStockpile: In neuen Lagerzonen alle Items verbieten
Select this option to disable all resources in newly created stockpiles without having to click the "Clear All" button.\n\nThe first stockpile that you create is an exception and will always be created with the default options.
LanguageData.EdB.MaterialSelection.Prefs.RightClickOn: Normally, you select materials by left-clicking or right-clicking on the building that you want to construct.\n\nEnable this option to select the material only when right-clicking.
LanguageData.EdB.PauseOnStart.Prefs.PauseOnStart: Neues oder geladenes Spiel sofort pausieren
LanguageData.EdB.PauseOnStart.Prefs.PauseOnStart.Tip: Selecting this option will pause the game when loading a saved game or starting a new game.\n\nThis is different than the option in vanilla RimWorld, which only pauses when loading a saved game.
